Package edu.ou.cs2334.project4.views

Class CellGridView

java.lang.Object
edu.ou.cs2334.project4.views.CellGridView
public class CellGridView extends Object
This class constructs each cell into a visible and fully automated toggle button.
Version:
0.1
Author:
Collaboration of Natalie Hill and Keon Moradi

  • Constructor Details

    • CellGridView

      public CellGridView(int numRows, int numCols, int cellLength)
      This is the constructor for a cell grid.
      Parameters:
      numRows - total number of rows in the grid
      numCols - total number of columns in the grid
      cellLength - the length of each cell

  • Method Details

    • initButtons

      public void initButtons(int numRows, int numCols, int cellLength)
      This method changes each cell into a toggle button.
      Parameters:
      numRows - the rows to search through
      numCols - the columns to search through
      cellLength - the length of each cell

    • getToggleButtons

      public javafx.scene.control.ToggleButton getToggleButtons(int row, int col)
      This method finds the specific toggle button to be returned.
      Parameters:
      row - the row to be searched
      col - the column to be searched
      Returns:
      the toggle button at an index in the grid
